title.rendered: LAWS students who received bursaries featured in AJPO newsletter

content.rendered: The Toronto Region of the Association of Justices of the Peace of Ontario awarded bursaries to five LAWS students who participated in the Court Experience Program.

excerpt.rendered: The Toronto Region of the Association of Justices of the Peace of Ontario awarded bursaries to five LAWS students who participated in the Court Experience Program.
